channel.title: nhl on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in nhl on Ross A. Baker

item.description: One of my favorite NHL traditions is how they engrave your name on the Stanley Cup with an asterisk when your fans neglect to boo Gary Bettman. #nhl #vgk

Where are all the #sports fans at? That's the banter I'm missing most. I might spin off a more personal identity so I don't alienate my fellow propellerheads. #MLB #NFL #NBA #NHL #Soccer #CFB #CBB #Cubs #Bears #Pacers #Blackhawks #Hoosiers #iufb #iubb
